message: This story made me cry. Her father's reaction is heartbreaking and to see the thief's reaction as he shrugged it off? What a loser of a person this man is for stealing from a baby and have no remorse for doing it.
They're power hungry money/grubbing SOB's; that's why I don't save, I just don't shop there ever!!

Nothing to see here, really. Chile is an exception. It has more liberal policies, and a good education system. Colombia is following on the right direction too.

The USA without warning to parents or other adults, aerial spray above pedestrians on side walks & childrens school grounds. what is happening at the refuge...besides some people camping in the cold? People take guns on public land all the time when they're camping... Are you saying the bad words have caused you injury? How? Did you go there, knowing what was going on? How, exactly, are they not being peaceful? They have met with law enforcement, the media, the towns people..no one has been killed..no commerce has been held up. Whereas, the bridge hangers actually endagered themselves, shut down car traffic and river traffic...????
Pretty funny really
